bioconda.name: bioconductor-xmapbridge
bioconda.summary: Export plotting files to the xmapBridge for visualisation in X:Map

biotools.summary: This package can plot graphs in the X:Map genome browser. It exports plotting files in a suitable format.

bioschemas.name: xmapbridge
bioschemas.summary: This package can plot graphs in the X:Map genome browser. It exports plotting files in a suitable format.
